thread.title: BRIEF-Jindal Poly Investment And Finance Says ‍IFCI Filed Application To Debts Recovery Tribunal-I With Co As Defendant

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jindal Poly Investment And Finance Says ‍IFCI Filed Application To Debts Recovery Tribunal-I With Co As Defendant

organizations.name: jindal poly investment and finance company ltd

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Jindal Poly Investment And Finance Company Ltd:
* ‍IFCI FILED APPLICATION TO DEBTS RECOVERY TRIBUNAL-I DELHI WHEREIN CO IS A DEFENDANT
* CO HAD PLEDGED SHARES OF JINDAL INDIA POWERTECH WITH IFCI AS SECURITY FOR OCD'S ISSUED BY JINDAL INDIA POWERTECH Source text: bit.ly/2Be4g9w Further company coverage:
